players.name: Alice
memory: Bob: "I'm shocked by Diana's sudden death. We should all be on high alert and work together to find out who did this."
Charlie: "Bob is the mafioso, I investigated him last night and discovered his true identity."

Charlie: "Bob is the mafioso, I investigated him last night and discovered his true identity. We should all be on high alert and work together to find out who else might be involved in Diana's death."
You: "I'm not sure if I believe Charlie, can we discuss this further and figure out what really happened?"

Bob: "I believe Charlie's accusation against me is unfounded. I was with Diana the entire day and did not have any reason to harm her. Let us focus on finding the real killer instead of pointing fingers at each other."
